document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">My </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#28ff42">River </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#28ff42">runs </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">thee </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#28ff42">Blue </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#28ff42">Sea! </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#1c48ff">Wilt </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">welcome </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">me? </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">My </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#28ff42">River </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#28ff42">waits </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#28ff42">reply </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Oh </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#28ff42">Sea </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">look </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#28ff42">graciously. </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">I'll </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#28ff42">fetch </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">thee </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#28ff42">Brooks </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">From </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#28ff42">spotted </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#28ff42">nooks </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Say </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#28ff42">Sea </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Take </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Me! </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: My river runs to thee
